name: The Bomble Mines
description:
This game was made in 1.5 days for Ludum-dare 48

The story is that you fell into mine with bombles, a mix of bubbles and bombs and you have to go deeper and deeper to get out. Couldn't add the story in the game but hey it's a game jam

I hope you like the game even if its not that good and well rate how much you think is fair

Arrow keys to move and press the up key to jump
